aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-8660-150 at Central Command Hub

defect_observed.value: Thrust reverser deployment delay. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 08/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/09/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 09/09/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 13/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 16/09/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Thrust reverser deployment delay. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
